you think the consent is reasonably understood to be limited to a law enforcement officer who has authority under the applicable law of the jurisdiction?

Mr. Chief Justice, and may it please the Court: to Respondent's argument has two major points.
The state of California has represented in its amicus brief that the State has a little over sixty-seven thousand police officers and a little over seen thousand probation officers within the State.
The honorable court is now adjourned until tomorrow at ten o'clock.
